thread.title: Glow-in-the-dark bed will creep you out for Halloween
thread.title_full: Glow-in-the-dark bed will creep you out for Halloween

title: Glow-in-the-dark bed will creep you out for Halloween
text:
Glow-in-the-dark bed will creep you out for Halloween 
Cnet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Get Laid Beds' glow-in-the-dark model will soothe your nightmares or create new ones. The bed is a limited-edition creation for Halloween. Only 50 will be made.The wooden bed frame features a sickly green glow thanks to UV luminous paint. It charges up during daylight hours and radiates a soft light when it gets dark. The glow can last for a couple hours. The bed itself is made from solid pine and appears white with a very slight greenish tint during the day.It's a perfect piece of furniture to complement your geeky Halloween decor, which may already include some...
